name: Ten Days to War
description:
Your team is tired, HQ has ordered you to assassinate two more high-value targets as well as perform reconnaissance on a third. Make one more move and the local counter-intelligence authorities will certainly pinpoint your location and execute you all. What's more important to you? The mission, or your team's survival?

Ten Days to War is a covert spy-team management game, where you, the commander of the spy team, must balance different aspects of your team's operations to ensure peace between your country and it's neighbor countries, the survival of your team, and executing HQ's orders.

  • Turn based gameplay
  • Also story based
  • Multiple endings
  • Which ending you get is determined by your actions through out the game.

You can run, but we are faster; you can hide, but we see all...
